website_summaries.verdict: A versatile and stylish set of corner shelves at a very affordable price point.
pros: Users report being pleased not only with the value for the price, but the attractive look and ease of set up
It also stands out for being a good height, and we love that it is versatile enough for many spaces
cons: Not as durable as a model like the Kai Teak shelves, and it may lean if heavy items are placed on the upper shelves

customer_reviews.title: Great Tower...Don't OverLoad It 😳
customer_reviews.text: Great Tower! I really like this tower. It's the same height as me and I am 5'4. The reason I gave 4 stars is because when you put too much on the top of the tower, it starts to lean. So be careful. Other than that...excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Lessa B.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHOULD BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: FOR $19.20 (or even $17 for Dark Cherry!) THIS IS GREAT DEAL. LOOK SLEEK AND NICE FINISHED. STRONG ENOUGH FOR 20lbs EACH TIRE. HERE IS MY TIP THAT MAKE YOUR SHELF MORE STURDY. AFTER YOU BUILT IT YOU MUST COME BACK AND TIGHT ALL THE POLES ALL OVER AGAIN. BECAUSE EVERYTIME YOU MOVE TO BUILD THE NEXT TIER YOUR LEFT HAND WILL UNSCREW THE PREVIOUS POLE THAT YOU JUST BUILD THAT CAUSE THE SHELF FLIMSY SO BUILD IT AND COME BACK TO SCREW EVERY POLE REAL TIGHT.
customer_reviews.author: xixigoddxsujin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up but if you're using it for more than a few books then you definitely have to use the wall hook to keep it from leaning.
customer_reviews.author: Say what now?

customer_reviews.title: Cute Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect one! Just as I needed. I was looking for some cute small corner shelf to place at the entrance in my home. It's nice and sturdy, satisfied more than I expected for it's price. It looks super cute and welcoming while entering home. Assembling it just took couple of minutes. I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Indianrecipe4u

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: All the reviews were on point. Beautiful shelf for an amazing price. Although the poles do look and feel "cheap" when installing, ultimately the piece altogether looks perfect and feels sturdy. I have mine on carpet and tried to set it up so that it tilts slightly to the corner to avoid it ever falling forward, but I made sure to load the heavier items on bottom and lighter on top. I have NO fear whatsoever that mine will tip over. Seriously one of my favorite purchases in a while! Thank you to this company for making an affordable yet aesthetically pleasing item!
customer_reviews.author: Liana Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: How cute is this!?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, Looks great. The shelves are wood but the sides that hold it together are plastic. No hatdware, everything just twists together. Mine did wobble just a little, I had to put something under one of the legs But now it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Bryant

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't place too heavy an item on these shelves as it is super light weight
customer_reviews.text: For $20, this shelf is worth the purchase. Don't expect stellar quality, because that's not the price point for this. I did take off 1 star because the screw-in mechanism for the shelf legs is a bit crude. And the end caps are not ideal for hand screwing in, because there's no way to grip it. I wouldn't place too heavy an item on these shelves as it is super light weight, but check out my photo for what I did manage to put on it. Super light weight makes it easy to move around. For the price, this is just what I expected and received.
customer_reviews.author: A_S

customer_reviews.title: Apparently NO quality control!
customer_reviews.text: This item comes with simple instructions. 4 shelves. The top 3 shelves are lettered “A”. The bottom shelf is lettered “B” to accommodate for the small front leg that balances the unit. I received 3 “A” shelves & 1 “B”. They were marked accordingly with stickers on the backside.....Except my “B” shelf didn’t have a hole drilled for assembling the front leg. Instead of the complete hassle of repackaging, returning & waiting for the possibility of a properly packaged shipment, I drilled my own hole. Someone needs to pay attention to what they are doing. I hate incompetency!hence the 1 star rating...
customer_reviews.author: badfisch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our powder room, totally love it!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my needs..place it on our powder room and its looks great! Its easy to assemble, i ordered it sunday and it arrived today (monday)
customer_reviews.author: March

customer_reviews.title: Tall and sturdy for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's great! Mine's missing the top caps and the legs for the bottom. I let the seller know so hopefully they'll take care of that. Still stands up without the bottom legs. Versatile, light, and super low price. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Vintajenn

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS SO EASY TO PUT TOGETHER and is so useful so far
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS SO EASY TO PUT TOGETHER and is so useful so far! I love that it comes with things to help nail this into the wall wherever you'd like to nail it *if* you want to. I have a very uneven corner, so that was very, very helpful to me. Perfect size, easy to put together, looks great and matches everything else I have. The way some people reviewed it on here made it sound super cheap so I lowered my expectations, but when I got it it was exactly what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: In this case...got a little better than I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. This shelf is at the end of a long hallway and didn't need to be expensive. $25 was well worth it. Looks terrific and was the perfect size for that corner. Shelves are pressed wood and uprights are plastic. but they look very nice. See attached photos taken at various distances from the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. Was super easy to put together. It looks very nice. Every corner should have one!
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Pieces were missing but it was from Amazon warehouse so idk.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from Amazon warehouse and am reviewing the actual item I received as it was. It was missing SEVERAL pieces. Everything else I've gotten from Amazon warehouse and everything else made by furinno has been at least been something I could replace the missing hardware myself. This was not. I'm sure this WOULD have been a wonderful item to display my little amiibos or whatever but it was missing the tops to the tubes as well as the feet. I'm not sure how to get ahold of furinno but I tried and just figured it's a very small loss and if I buy this again I'll only buy it brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Richard S.

customer_reviews.title: Not even worth $5
customer_reviews.text: The packaging is horrible. Every shelf is scratched. I suppose technically I wasn't missing parts if I got half of one of the caps right? The legs aren't even so it doesn't sit level. Although I could have probably returned it I gave up $20 for the satisfaction of setting this garbage on fire 10 minutes after it would have been completely assembled if I'd received whole parts. Definitely the worst item I've ever purchased online. And I order a lot of things I don't have any expectations of....
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good small shelf 👌
customer_reviews.text: Product was I credibly easy to assemble. It's exactly as described in color, what it's made of and size. I wasn't expecting a solid wood shelf that will last thirty years because it's not what's decribed or what I paid for. Price was reasonable for the quality and the shelf hold everything I intended it to. I'm using the small attachment to keep it from tipping over. Perfect for my small office space.
customer_reviews.author: Joy E

customer_reviews.title: Bargain buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good buy for price..I needed extra storage in downstairs bathroom...I was pleasantly surprised by quality..the legs are plastic..and the shelves engineered wood...But it seems pretty sturdy...it looks better in person imo... instructions were to rhe point..easy !!..Highly recommend..see attached photos😁
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: I'm satisfied. *Note* Not all booze depicted in picture
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what people expect for this price, sure it's light, and may appear a little flimsy but it serves the purpose I got it for.. Booze storage. You are gonna want to use the included zip tie and screw to secure it to the wall since there is a chance it can tip forward..the zip tie I got was a little too short so I simply got a longer one. Other than that, I'm satisfied. *Note* Not all booze depicted in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Babb

customer_reviews.title: This product is exactly what you see in the listing.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to fill a corner in my living room and place a short lamp, some candles and a bluetooth speaker on. The product itself is made from plastic and particle wood, however it is not obvious once assembled and assembly took maybe 5 minutes. It should also be noted that the corner of my living room was not even as carpet was being pushed up from the wall. Fortunately the product came with a drywall loop screw and zip tie to secure the shelf into the corner of the wall. Great price, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: If I Can Put This together Alone, Anyone Can
customer_reviews.text: Seriously. I'm not handy. No tools were needed--I twisted the tubes into each other with the shelves in-between them, as instructed, and it can all be unscrewed if you make a mistake, no big deal. It says it takes 20 minutes, but if you're good at putting things together, you'll probably do it faster than I did. The tubes are surprisingly strong for plastic and the shelves are particle board, as pictured. It looks just like the images and took me 20 minutes to assemble. This is an affordable, easy to put together corner shelf. It's larger than I expected, too. I'm completely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: T.L.C.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap
customer_reviews.text: Not what I had expected. The compressed wood was beginning to bubble as thought the box was left in a damp area. Chipped board also. Plastic poles. Very cheap quality. I'm returning it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little shelf for ivy
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is easier with two people. You must be very careful when beginning to thread the poles -- make sure you don't strip the threads. Rubbing the threads with Dawn dish detergent makes the process move more smoothly. It does require a bit of force. Use a wrench to tighten the top pieces, being careful not to scratch the top. I bought this for my front window that has a large sill, and it looks really nice. It should be stable as long as it isn't overloaded. I intend to put small plants and ivy on it, which will look nice. I may even get another for the other side.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, luxury, simplistic small shelf
customer_reviews.text: This shelf was EXACTLY what I needed!!! Perfect for the small space in our dining room where I wanted to display a few nice liquor bottles, but didn’t want a big bulky bar. Needed to drill into the wall (so make sure you have a drill for instillation). I didn’t have one handy so I used a screwdriver and a hammer to get a “good enough” position to screw and zip tie the shelf securely. Really love the way this matches the grey wood we have in our dining room. 5 stars!!!! Oh yea and it took 5 mins to build. Doesn’t get easier than that!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca vega

customer_reviews.title: Best Price for Shelves (Highly Recommendable Purchase)
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved and needed something to hold photos and awards etc, wanted something nice but modern and that fit in the corners to balance the TV on the wall. Well due to COVID 19 most stores are closed, but to my surprise these affordable shelving units not only look good, but are designed very solid. They don’t look or feel the price that they are offered, they could easily go for about $25-$30 more. I ended up buying 4! Great Product!!! I even found small tables made by the same company for my home office printer and ended up buying another just for the sitting area.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzock

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT. ITS AMAZING.
customer_reviews.text: I would 10/10 buy this again! I am so in love! I brought all of my husband's tools into the living room to put it together but you don't need any tools to assemble! It all screws together. Very self explanatory, you don't need to read the instructions in my opinion. Comes with a zip tie, hook, and some other little thingy to stablize it (screw it to your wall) but I don't think it's necessary. It's staying up very well on its own and I shook it after putting my plants on there and it was stable. I'll probably order another one very soon. Thank you ♥️😊
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Beerbower

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but awful
customer_reviews.text: Scratches and weird swirls all over. I would have been happy if this were ten bucks and I was in college, but this things a piece of crapmanship. It's all plastic tubing, so it's very light weight. But if you want quality, forget it. Not packaged with styrofoam so those white dots in the pics are just straight up nicks in the product. Giving away. NOT worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Lodge

customer_reviews.title: Preey good stand
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is super easy and the stand is neat looking. The fact that the undersides of the shelves are unfinished is the main unfortunate aspect of this stand (hence the 4 stars). The undersides of the fourth and fifth shelves show when you are looking at it from a seated position. The unfinished shelves are the only thing about the stand that looks cheap, and it cheapens the otherwise attractive look. The shelves do indeed support weighty objects (up to 15 lbs as instructed). But to do so, It is absolutely essential to secure the 5 shelf stand with the strap. After securing it, there is minimal wobble and good support and security.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Pillow display
customer_reviews.text: Thin pressed particle board that is barely coated completely with poorly cast plastic tubes that do not twist into each other. It is so unstable and that you have to zip tie it to the wall and can't trust anything of value on it. Maybe for a children's play room to display stuffed animals, but it is definitely not worth the money- you can find something much better at Walmart for probably less too. I wouldn't even get this for a dorm. I had to return mine because the bottom shelf was damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Maetoes

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap. The products shelves came scuffed in multiple spots exposing the particle board interior. The leg posts that screw into one another between shelves and into the feet weren't threaded so getting them to work was a small miracle. One leg did break however because a lot of force was needed to screw them in without the proper threading. The price is cheap but I was surprised just how cheap the workmanship is. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Awful to set up
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for... I expected some cheesy material or subpar instructions, because this was so cheap. But the unit is assembled by screwing plastic rods into plastic holes, no metal involved. Okay, fine, why is this a problem? Because the construction is *so cheap* that the tracks of the rods do not always fit with the tracks of the holes. I spent more time and effort trying to force plastics together, fighting against their poor alignment, than I did putting together a much more expensive, sturdier, better made shelving unit later that week. A huge disappointment. It's also not at all sturdy. If this wasn't for holding rarely-used items, it probably would have fallen already.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Have Low Expectations and You'll Love It
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be cheap material so I got everything I expected and wanted. It's a great size. Fits into the corner of my room well. I use it for books and just keep the heavier ones on the bottom shelf. The would pattern looks nice and is the color it said in the description. If you're expecting to get a super nice shelf with super sturdy materials, you're going to be disappointed. If you're expecting to get what you paid for, knowing it's particleboard and some plastic, you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel S

customer_reviews.title: Supports are just plastic tubes, cheap.
customer_reviews.text: If you just need something to sit in a corner and hold some not-so-heavy-things then this is the shelf for you... But don't let it get into any areas too humid, or put anything with moisture on it. The particle board levels are prone to blistering and warping. The tubes that hold each level are just plastic, not necessarily strong durable plastic. From a distance this looks like a decent modern corner table. It does the job I suppose. I don't think I'd buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Riegler

customer_reviews.title: Simple, lightweight corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: What I was looking for: A black, cheapish corner shelf to place next to my TV. Pros -Lightweight -Easy to assemble and all the parts fit correctly -Stays fairly stable on carpet though I have less than 5 pounds of weight on each shelf Cons -The paint on the edges of the shelves is scuffed -Though the corner shelf stays stable on carpet, since it is lightweight, uneven weight distribution can cause it to lean. However, it does come with hardware to anchor it to a wall.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Decent little shelf for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and easy to assemble. Looks a little on the cheap side, I mean, the shelves are particle wood only “finished” (covered with veneer) on one side. The poles are plastic. But honestly for the price it isn’t bad... it’s not a gorgeous piece of furniture, but it’s not a complete eyesore, either. I just needed something inexpensive to hold spillover books that won’t fit on my existing bookshelf. It works great for my tiny apartment. Definitely not sturdy, I had to strategically place the heaviest books on the bottom and the top is just holding a picture frame. The package does include a screw and zip tie to tether it to the wall and prevent tipping.
customer_reviews.author: erinelizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Price sky-rocketed
customer_reviews.text: I needed 3 of these to build a display for my collection of rubber stamps. The first 2 I purchased were an easy $19.57 each. 2 days later I went back to order a third one and the price more than doubled for ONE shelf. WTH. I refused to pay that for ONE shelf so I had to pick out a shad that was close and paid almost $30 for ONE. Huge disappointment about the price on these. For some reason, there must have been a big run and everybody wanted one....
customer_reviews.author: catzmeeeow

customer_reviews.title: Just as described.
customer_reviews.text: This is just as described. For the price it's a very nice corner stand. I use it in the den to put picture frames on. I wouldn't put anything too heavy on it . It's very stable on my tile floor but not so much on carpet. Worth the price for sure. Goes together easily, all the holes are aligned and no parts missing. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Busted 2x!
customer_reviews.text: In really wanted to love this shelving unit, plus I REALLY needed this unit. However, the first one I received, what would be the back corner part of the shelves were all cracked and busted. I would not have minded if it was just 1or 2, but every one of the shelf pieces were broke and busted up.. I gave them the benefit of the first, ordered a replacement, and b BOOM. SAME EXACT THING... This was very disappointing, as I really needed one of these units! Just be careful, you definitely get what you pay for with!
customer_reviews.author: CraftAustTie83

customer_reviews.title: Great for binder storage!
customer_reviews.text: It really is exactly as described. It's quite wobbly without any weight, but as you can see, I've added plenty! Feels more secure once it's loaded. I'm a teacher and needed somewhere to store binders. (If you've ever had a teacher amount of binders, you know how important this is.) I bought this shelf unit as it fit in the corner and was curved (which meant binders would fit.) It's perfect for what I needed. I'm seriously considering buying another but I'm curious first to see how the plastic poles hold up with the weight of the binders.
customer_reviews.author: Dymisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small space
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 4 tier shelf. Needed something for the bedroom for a nightstand and had to have a small something as the closet doors are bifold and come out so far when opened. This fits perfectly in the small space we have and holds up great. Top shelf has a lamp for light and the next shelf down has clock and phone holder for charging. Other two shelf's I haven't put anything on yet but thinking of what to put. Would recommend this to anyone needing a shelf for small space.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf - Horrible sticker
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is perfectly fine. Assembles in just a couple minutes, is very cute, and works great. My only complaint, and the reason for the 4-star rating, is the formaldehyde compliant sticker they put on it. I went to take it off and it ripped the paint off and left a sticky residue. I know this shelf isn’t that expensive, but surely they can do better than this. I would recommend this shelf still, just be careful taking off the sticker.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble. Sits about 5 feet 4 inches high. Poles are plastic and shelves are wood. I like the idea and look of this. I gave it two stars for that. But Since I have children under the ages of 4. That’s all it gets. This is a handsome looking but dangerous shelve. It can easily be pulled down with no or little effort. And I hope they don’t attempt to climb!!! This would’ve been perfect if the plastic poles were wood.
customer_reviews.author: Mrschase80

customer_reviews.title: Small and unsteady without wall mounts
customer_reviews.text: I just received the shelf and put it together quickly. Pros: 1. Very easy to assemble 2. Very light, so it’s easy to move around Cons: 1. One of the board arrives with defect on the surface, but it’s usable so I didn’t bother to return 2. Shelve is not very stable without wall mounts, but either way I don’t suggest putting much stuff on it 3. The size of boards are not very good, it can only hold small items. It’s my fault for not checking the size before buying. Summary: It’s a display usage shelf for small items.
customer_reviews.author: Euphemia

customer_reviews.title: Quality is okay. Price is great
customer_reviews.text: For the price, the quality is decent. The assembly is really easy but “leg” or the connection between the table tops are made of plastic. It gives a appearance of wood but it’s just cheap material. But hey, the price is cheap and it’s cute decor in your room to hold other decoration pieces. However, be careful! Don’t put heavy items on this. I don’t think it is sturdy enough to handle that.
customer_reviews.author: Faye

customer_reviews.title: It's not new!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and easy to assemble, took less than 10 minutes to put together. However I was very disappointed to notice the plastic bags were torn and scotch taped. It is obvious the seller shipped me a used or returned product! I decide to keep it because it is in good shape and I don't want to make a trip just to return it and then have to wait a few days to receive a new one. And, who knows if that will be a "new" one..
customer_reviews.author: CMS.

customer_reviews.title: Goes Together Easy, Cheap But Expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great little corner table for our nursery. It is flimsy if nothing of weight is on the middle or bottom, but we loaded it up with some items to stabilize and its been working great. It also is pretty cheaply put together with some of the side trim loose but that part is against the wall for us so it didn't matter as much. Overall its great if you need an inexpensive functional table but if you are planning on putting it where people might see it a lot I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: The support beams are made of plastic, similar if not little more durable than what you'd find in children's toys. The shelving is made of light particle board. Comes with a little anchor and loop to anchor it to the wall. It actually stands quite nicely, and looks fairly good. Because the shelving is so small, I found it difficult to overload. Just needed something presentable to take up a corner in my apartment, hold an internet router and odd decoration, and it does exactly that. Pretty happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: A good little shelf....
customer_reviews.text: I like these little corner shelves. Easy to assemble. Look nice when put together. It came packaged well and was in good condition with no parts missing. I have ordered the blue with white tubes twice. A good price on a good product. Assembly of this little corner shelf is hassle free... A family member mentioned how much she liked them when she visited my home after I had gotten them... she made the comment that she thought one would look good in her kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS

customer_reviews.title: It took the most 20 minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I have to say that I was a bit surprised by how easy our mail carrier brought up the box. I was even more surprised that I carried the box with one arm. Had I read the description I would have known. The legs are a plastic PVC and the shelves are a cork material. This doesn’t appear to be waterproof so keep that in mind if you planned on having plants or anything that would require water. I’m at fault for overlooking the material so it shouldn’t count against the unit. This may be suitable for a dorm or something along those lines.
customer_reviews.author: 78Brownie

customer_reviews.title: Not the fanciest table, but perfect for a small apt
customer_reviews.text: This is not a fancy or glamorous table. I bought it to put in a small corner to hold a lamp and a few small chochkies. It took 2 minutes to put together and fits perfectly where I needed it. It looks more expensive than $19 - and that is all I needed. I would not put heavy things on it put it in an area where it could be tipped over - it isn't sturdy. But it worked great for my needs and I like the price a lot :)
customer_reviews.author: girl2012

customer_reviews.title: Convenient with a 10 pound limit...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Assembled in 15 minutes, maybe less. All plastic and particle board, using it in a temporary office space with limited room. Each plastic tube screws into the one above and below it, and it does come with a tie wrap and an anchor. The only tool I used was to make the hole for the anchor. Cons: I wouldn't aim the AC vent at it. Each shelf is only rated for 10 pounds, which seems like a lot until you weigh a book or a vase full of water.
customer_reviews.author: JLasanta

customer_reviews.title: Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: This shelf literally fell apart. While I was assembling the shelf, I noticed that I was having a hard time 'screwing' in almost every pole to the shelves. I placed it in a very small corner, and it tipped forward, hit the toilet tank and the bars snapped off, even the shelves on the bottom broke. About 5 years ago I ordered a similar shelf from the same company, and returned it. I'll remember for next time to not make this mistake again.
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This product is made with poor quality. Once assembled it does stay together. However, it leans forward even with tying it as suggested. The item is wobbly, appears tacky, and cheap looking. The shelves hold the weight as described but I am a bit disappointed with how unsteady this piece of furniture is overall to say the least. Unfortunately, I do not recommend this to those interested in purchasing anything affiliated with Furinno!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Worse than IKEA
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I'm back in college when I stare at this in my studio. It's worse than IKEA. But it does it's job -- although I wouldn't put anything of value on this. I've taped it against the wall because it's entirely unstable (although I've weighed it at the bottom by placing heavy objects) and like someone else said, it came with one of the tier assembly "holes" already cracked/busted. I wasn't shocked because I'd read about it. I'm not sure if I would even put this in my basement of my home, and here, currently in a rented studio -- I'm glad I do not invite any guests over.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Simple, cheap, and effective.
customer_reviews.text: Let's be honest here: these things are cheap. It's plastic and press board. But they're also really nice and they look great. It's so easy to assemble its ridiculous and it all comes in a tiny little box with little mess to throw out later. Everything screws together so no tools are needed, and if I had to find any one thing actually bad about it, it would be that it's not the most stable thing ever, but that's an easy fix for anyone resourceful enough. For the price, it's hard to beat if you just want something quick, easy, and simple.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kianka

customer_reviews.title: IT IS A BARGAIN AT $20.
customer_reviews.text: The family room in our condo is maybe the size of a normal bedroom. We have a TV, 2 lounge chairs and a loveseat in there, so it's pretty jammed up. This corner table stack is perfect; it fits right in without cluttering up the place. I use it to display my ROKR wood puzzles, with the ROKR clock on top. It is great; I would recommend the white/pearl finish, as it picks up the wall color great and looks like a custom install.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen S.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I got the most wood-looking color and it's perfect for what I wanted it for. I have a small corner that I wanted to display an art piece on, and this fit the bill. It went together in a snap. I noticed other people saying it was wobbly but I have not had that experience at all. It's very stable and sturdy. Maybe they were putting too much on it or placed it on carpeting. Mine is on tile. For the money, this is a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Chris, Kansas City

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf!
customer_reviews.text: I really like my 5-tier shelf. I purchased it for extra storage in a corner of my clothes closet. It was quick & easy to put together. Cute & sturdy, too. Some of the tubes fit together better than others so, through trial & error, I matched up and assembled the three 5-piece column of tubes first. I then took each tier of tubes off the columns, lubricated the male end with a bar of soap to make assembly easier & built it layer by layer that way. The soap helped a lot! I'd recommend & purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: JenJo

customer_reviews.title: Just want I needed for my bathroom
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 shelfs from this brand. I like them ALOT. 1. Very affordable. 2. SO EASY to put together; no tools needed. 3. Items are stable when using an anchor; which you should ALWAYS anchor furniture no matter what. Saftey first. 4. All the items I ordered from this brand came in perfect condition; no chips, no missing pieces. Love the simplicity of these pieces
customer_reviews.author: Jenessaislit

customer_reviews.title: Total POS.
customer_reviews.text: I had an idea that for the price this wasn’t going to be a high-quality item but wow, is it ever a POS. The posts are plastic and the shelves pressed particle board. The male and female threads in the posts don’t match smoothly so it takes some elbow grease to screw them together. Finally, it’s wobbly and tilts about 10 degrees off-center. This would be good for a storage shed or workroom, for what I don’t know but it’s not something that should be placed in the living or dining areas.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hoekwater

customer_reviews.title: Great for a trophy display
customer_reviews.text: I bought this display rack for my husband's Tae Kwon Do trophys and medals, it was super easy to assemble, but it was missing one cover piece so I was a little disappointed by there, but other wise you get what you pay for. It's made of a compressed wood, it's not real wood, the tiers are made of black plastic. But honestly it looks great and does the job. I'm satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nona Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good overall, what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: It's about what you would expect for something made out of plastic tubing and pressed board. It's light, but hey, gets the job done.It does come with a screw eye/zip tie to secure the back corner to the wall and it's pretty sturdy once you do that and give it some support. I got this for an ugly corner in my dorm room. It was a bit of a pain to set up because the instructions were really vague, but it's fine once you know what you are doing. But it has held up great over the last few terms. I have no complaints. It a nice alternative to buying a wood corner shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Eliza D.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really like this shelf!!! The first one I ordered was to fillin a small corner between my bthrm sink & commode. It was two tall so I removed one of the shelves and it worked perfectly.😊 So, I needed something extra in my bdrm for a crowded dresser top, so I ordered another and this time I inserted the extra self I had leftover from the first one and it is gorgeous and fits the space perfectly!!! Also, the color was exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: BARBARA SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a corner in the office
customer_reviews.text: If it takes two minutes to put together it has taken you too long. Super simple to put together and sturdy enough for a Google Home, SimpliSafe, a brochure holder and aroma lamp, it is sturdy. I could load it up even more and I am sure it will hold. We have a small space behind my assistant's desk and this fit perfectly. I blends with the dark brown of the desk. I am thinking to get one for my office. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Brewington

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, a cheap product
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to assemble as the plastic parts aren't a perfect fit and you have to force them together. In a couple of places, I simply could not properly screw them in. Also a couple of the shelves were already scratched, and you can tell that the "wood finish" is a sticker because it's glued overlapping in some places. It's also leans pretty badly even before I put anything on it. I would honestly return it, but I'm not willing to go through the process of dissembling it and returning. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Get what you paid for. Very cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Small shelves for the corner that look nice if people don't look too closely. The poles are made of plastic and don't look completely straight when fully assembled. The wood is not the exact color of the picture. The Walnut wasn not nearly as dark as I was expecting. It holds my stuff, but I should have spent a little bit more money on a higher quality piece of furniture. The hook to keep it from falling over attaches to the product with a zip tie so late looks tacky. Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.author: Elliot Madinger

customer_reviews.title: good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment where space is valuable. This bookshelf fits neatly into a corner, looks super cute, and is tall enough to where it doesn't look awkward but isn't touching the ceiling. the only thing is, I would advise against putting anything fragile on the bookshelf. it's sturdy for the price but I am only using it for books, the occasional small plant, etc. definitely do not put anything heavy above the bottom three shelves. easy to assemble (took us maybe 5 minutes), and looks great. worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Partical board shows underneath
customer_reviews.text: Poles are made of plastic material and shelves are partical board, which makes it affordable. I would have been happy with purvhase, if patical board was not showing underneath the 5 shelves. I bought is for my staircase landing. It looks so cheap and tacky due to the view of the actual partical board when looking up. Contemplating on spray painting or put in garage??
customer_reviews.author: Link37

customer_reviews.title: Kind'a cheap, but works
customer_reviews.text: So, there are some pro's and cons to this item, but it seems to be ok for the most part. Materials- This item is composed of composite wood shelves, and plastic poles and end-caps. Pro's - Pretty Easy to assemble, took me about 5mins. Lightweight, so easy to move around. Comes with a zip-tie "stabilizer" that you can attach to the wall, to prevent item from falling over) Con's - A little wobbly. Probably not good for heavy items (at least not for the middle or top shelf) All in all, I'm not sure it's worth the price I paid, but we'll see if it will do the job and how long it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect piece for the corner in my bathroom, I got decorative baskets to put washcloths, soaps, etc and it is beautiful, the spacers are a hard plastics which was fine because it is super sturdy for my needs. It was so very easy to assemble which was great as well. I would highly recommend for a small corner space to display more lightweight items. It was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TameraG

customer_reviews.title: Whoa!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this applies, but I got the Amazon Warehouse one and it is so junky. Literally covered in coffee stains and heavily used. I am shocked they would resell this item. The box was covered in grease and smelled. Speechless!
customer_reviews.author: Kim S.

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price for perfect solution to have usable corner space.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: All components came in perfect condition with clear instructions. Took only a few minutes to assemble. Fits into a small corner space so that space isn’t wasted between a couch and a large bookcase. It is sturdy enough to use as a book case. I like the white and light tan color. The price was reasonable. I don’t have any complaints. Would purchase again if I need another.
customer_reviews.author: L. M. L. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: OK, this is a very cheaply made product but for what I wanted it looks and works just fine. It is actually quite sturdy when assembled but the edges are fragile and easily damaged. So if it is just going to sit in a corner and not get bumped or knocked into it is great. Super easy to assemble. The parts fit together tightly so it sits very solidly with no wobble. I think it is a good value for a small price.
customer_reviews.author: Countess Ferrari

customer_reviews.title: Great little shelf for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something small to fit in a little corner in my room to hold my personal products. Nothing fancy or expensive, so I went with this! Assembly is a breeze with this unit -- took about 90 seconds with two people screwing the pieces together. It isn't the world's most solid piece, but for the price, it holds up nice and isn't shaky. (If it's going in the corner, it shouldn't really be shaken much anyway, right?) Each shelf holds about 10lb I believe, although it's not advised to put anything heavy on the top for safety's sake. This unit really maximized a small amount of space and gave me so much room - I'm so happy!
customer_reviews.author: squeblastrich

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy things
customer_reviews.text: This works great for decoration and lightweight items (frames, candles, general decor, etc). This is not good for practicality or any kind of real storage. It is very cheap. The poles are plastic, and it is wobbly - but it comes with a hook to attach to the wall, so it won’t fall over. It is kind of low quality, but it still looks nice and brings the room together. Basically, if you are using it for decorative purposes, and you don’t care about the quality, you will love it. But if you are regularly accessing it or storing heavy things, you will probably be unhappy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. It's in a dark corner, so you can't tell that it's not quite black (the legs are black, but the shelves are a dark brown). It's a simple set of shelves that are good for putting decorations or keys. It weighs next to nothing, but being in a corner, you're not going to have to worry about it being knocked over. Also of note, the bottom shelf does not sit directly on the ground. There is about a 1-1.5 inch gap that likes to trap dust and souls.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, attractive, functional
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a cheap shelf. The legs are made of formed plastic and the shelves are pressed board. However, it is sturdy and comes with an anchor and strap for added stability. I bought it to add some snazz to my office and hold coffee cups. I probably wouldn’t want it for my house but it is great for what it is. I’m pretty happy with it. Bottom line, not high quality materials but attractive and functional. Definitely get what you pay for with this.
customer_reviews.author: Kakoii

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a plant stand, as plant stands are so incredibly expensive for their purpose! It works fantastic and is so adorable next to our tv. If we had the room, I’d buy another one for the other side of our tv stand. My husband actually enjoyed the shelving so much I just bought the gray color to put in the corner of our bedroom for some of his things. It’s inexpensive, extremely easy to assemble, good looking, and surprisingly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised. I was really wary of this based on the proce, but at the price point- if it was horrible, oh well. Its not horrible. Its actually pretty great. The poles are sturdy and attractive and the shelves are sturdy. I got this to se if I want to order more from this company. I do and will. Im incredibly pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, overall worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use as a small bookshelf for the corner of my living room. My puppy will attempt to chew anything low enough for her to reach. I added about 15-20 hard and soft back books to the third and fourth tier, making it top heavy. I would strongly recommend a wall hook to stabilize. It fell twice before I rigged it up to lean towards the corner until I can insert the wall hooks. Overall super easy to put together, no scratches or dents in the wood or poles.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Naymon

customer_reviews.title: Gives you your bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: This was an affordable purchase that was quite easy to put together. There weren't any instructions, but they weren't really necessary...I did get slightly confused because the bottom has an extra hole in it where one of the small knobs screw into. Overall, it's nothing fancy, but it did the job of fleshing out my corner so that it doesn't go underutilized. It has nice, thick shelves that I think will hold a fair amount of items.
customer_reviews.author: Cherry Liu

customer_reviews.title: Cute and serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of this 3-tiered shelf, I got the blue and white one, and definitely the ease in which it goes together. I also like that I can change the colors of the shelf to either blue or white and add a little personalization to it. I’m disappointed in the way it looks when I pulled it out. Some of the shelves have marks on them and the back of one shelf is already peeling. Kind of looks like it had been used. Other than that, it adds some brightness to my office bathroom and holds what I want it to.
customer_reviews.author: Ry

customer_reviews.title: It’s really nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s really nice, super easy to assemble has some plastic parts what make me think that it may not be that durable, but for the price it’s just perfect fit just right in a corner and I’m using it for my plants
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Camargo

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space, Perfect corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product.. I have this in my bedroom with my make-up and sprays on it and it fits a lot if stuff. I di recommend anchoring it to the wall, I used zip ties in every other pole and nailed them to the wall which worked perfectly. Super easy assembly took me less then 5 minutes. I've bought a lot of furniture from this company and love the product's. Not a bank breaker and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: 🌟

customer_reviews.title: Good Value- but have plastic spindles!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised when I opened the box and found that the spindles were plastic! However, I went ahead and put them together and they are very sturdy and don’t look as cheap as what I paid for them. I’m overall very pleased. The instructions were a little confusing, but with a little common sense, I put them both together in about 15 mins. Oh and NO TOOLS are needed! For the price, I think they are a good value, but just wanted to warn about the plastic spindles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small corner shelf for next to my bed since I have a CPAP. It is the size they indicated, went together easily, and suits my needs perfectly. For the complaints that say it tips over, the description talks about a solid floor. I have carpeting, but they also provide an anchor for the wall to keep it from tipping. Highly recommend for a small space and to put lighweight objects.
customer_reviews.author: LJS

customer_reviews.title: Very light weight and made of cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they are easy to assemble and take up minimal space in the small bedroom that I put them in. I don't like having to anchor them to the wall, (so I just put some weight on the bottom shelf), and I ordered 2 of them and, although they look exactly the same, 1 was rated @ 10 .lbs per shelf and the other was rated @ 15 .lbs per shelf! Overall I am satisfied with them because I put them into a very small bedroom and needed somewhere to place high use small items.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect 👍
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my kids "classroom" at home. For the price it's perfect. Took maybe 5 minutes to put one together from start to finish. Comes with wall anchors which I was impressed with. It's plastic and particular board and I'm okay with that it'll hold up for my use and that's what I wanted. I bought 4 in total and combined two side by side for my art and library station.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Good value - looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I like the first one enough to order a couple more! I have one in a corner where I cannot fasten it to the wall to increase stability, but the objects on the shelving unit are not heavy, so no issues. On carpeted floor, it may need attached to the wall (strap included) to provide more support. Nice looking overall. Good for pictures, accent items, etc., but probably not sturdy enough for potted plants (without wall attachment).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hemelgarn

customer_reviews.title: good kids corner table.
customer_reviews.text: Although I could swear I measured properly, seemed taller than for what I needed it for but still works. Definitely needs to be put up against something because it is wobbly. Even my 8 year old (whose room it was for) pointed that out. Great color and matches her rooms color scheme. Some minor scratches here and there but for $11, and for a child, it's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Queenofthree

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's great.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, which is minimal, this is a great little shelf. It was easy to put together. Looks nice. And does it's job. I have it our downstairs bathroom and it's perfect for holding wet wipes, small decor, and toilet paper. Love it...though I wish the brown was a tad darker, but that's my fault.. I should have chosen the other brown. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for small space
customer_reviews.text: I renovated a small half bath and needed a shelf to hold essentials and a few accent pieces. I've assemb.led Turn n Tube furniture before but this shelf was not as easy to assemble... the threads on the ends of the plastic tubes were poorly molded but eventually it did go together and functions perfect. It even comes with a small anchor strap but being tucked into the corner by the sink it it sturdy enough I didn't bother strapping it.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Looks Better Than It Costs....
customer_reviews.text: Assembly is super EASY, without reading instructions. Just remember that piece with 4 holes is the bottom shelf. Pls are plastic, but that's what you pay for. Looks better than the materials are made of. I didnt want something expensive just to put things on, so this worked out better than I expected. Am thinking of buying another one!
customer_reviews.author: CocoA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great after sealing
customer_reviews.text: Got this On sale for $19. Comes with a little wall anchor. One shelf came slightly cracked. But it was fixable. I bought the light wood one. But it looked cheap so i sanded, stained and sealed each shelf bf assembly. It looks better and is stronger. The underside of these selves are very cheap staining or painting and sealing helps a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Arts

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This item came quickly, was easy to assemble and actually larger than I expected but still perfect for the 2 bedroom apartment I am in. I sat it on a 3 foot stool so that it reaches closer towards the cieling. Assembly literally took 10 minutes and it does come with an extra screw and tie to tether it to the wall to make it sturdier. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roxie

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2 and like them
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and yes they are sturdy on hard type floors and you for sure want to use the anchor and tie otherwise it's great and looks nice. I am not sure about using on carpet but again if you use the wall anchors it should be fine. I plan on getting one for my upstairs hallway eventually to hold some books and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Payne

customer_reviews.title: Not fancy but it works
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with this. It a very basic, kinda cheaply made shelf system. I had a weird corner in my kitchen that I wanted to use for storage and this was one of the few pieces that fits. Overall I am happy with my purchase and what I got for the price. Don't expect something super sturdy and fancy. If you just need something simple that works at a good price point then this is a good purchase for you.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect corner shelf
customer_reviews.text: When I saw this, I knew it would be just right for my small apartment. I like the way I can organize smaller items that I would otherwise be looking all over the apartment for. So I know exactly where to go to find them without the frustration of "the hunt". I felt the price was well suited to the quality. I may have to get a couple more to further simplify life.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas H.

customer_reviews.title: it's nice! The poles are plastic
customer_reviews.text: For $20, it's nice! The poles are plastic, the "wood" is like a particle board of sorts. The under side and each flat side of each shelf are not colored, so they're bare wood. The installation was easy. There are a couple steps you have to stop and think about, but it took me about 10 minutes to put it all together. No tools required. It fits nicely at the top of my staircase. I have a big vase on the middle shelf. Not sure what I'm going to put on top. It's a slippery surface, so keep that in mind. Again, for $20 it's a great little shelf for a corner you just don't have anything for.
customer_reviews.author: Tiff

customer_reviews.title: Big convenience, little price
customer_reviews.text: This shelf perfectly expanded storage capacity in an otherwise unused corner behind a recliner. It holds games, puzzles, books and magazines. I would encourage use of the included eye hook and zip tie for additional reinforcement, especially if using it with young children. It's not flashy, or super sturdy, but gets the job done on the cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Resume Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Easy to Assemble, and Modern
customer_reviews.text: This corner table can be used in the corner, or turned so it's against a straight wall. It's got a modern style, and doesn't look cheap at all. It's easy to assemble, and is a great table to place decor on, or alarm panels on in an entry way... that sort of thing. It's small enough so you won't bump into it when walking in a hallway or doorway.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Madsen

product_meta.title: Furinno Turn-N-Tube 5 Tier Corner Shelf, Espresso/Black
product_meta.description: Color:Espresso/Black| Size:5-Tier| Design:Shelving UnitFurinno 5-tier tube display/storage corner rack is designed to meet the demand of low cost but durable and efficient furniture. It is proven to be the most popular rta furniture due to its functionality, price, and the no hassle assembly. The materials comply with e1 grade particle board for furniture. There is no foul smell of chemicals, durable and it is the most stable particleboard used to make rta furniture. Care instructions: wipe clean with clean damped cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals. Please contact support@furinno for missing parts, damaged goods, or other questions. We are pleased to send you the replacement part free of charge. Pictures are for illustration purpose. All decor items are not included in this offer. Pictures are for illustration purpose. All decor items are not included in this offer.
feature_bullets: Simple stylish design yet Functional and suitable for any room
Material: engineered Particle Board, PVC tubes.
Great storage unit for bathroom, closet, home office, living room, kids room, kitchen, etc
Sturdy on flat surface and no hassle 5-minutes assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars15,273 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
